thread.title: Atlanta Falcons vs. New Orleans Saints: Thursday Night Football live updates, score, game chat
thread.title_full: Atlanta Falcons vs. New Orleans Saints: Thursday Night Football live updates, score, game chat | OregonLive.com

author: Tim Brown | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Atlanta Falcons vs. New Orleans Saints: Thursday Night Football live updates, score, game chat
text:
The undefeated Atlanta Falcons kick off Week 6 of the 2015 NFL season with a trip to New Orleans where they'll face the struggling New Orleans Saints on Thursday Night Football. Kickoff is at 5:25 p.m. PT. (TV on CBS, Comcast/Xfinity channel 6, or 706)
More : TV channel and how to watch this game online
Follow along as we bring you live updates and analysis from the game from kickoff through the final whistle in the comments section below. Have thoughts on how the Falcons or Saints are performing? Don't hesitate to jump in on the live updates and chat with us as the game rolls along.
